Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Raven Troops in the Divine Furnace impede our efforts to reset the furnace controls.

Clear away the {@LinkCreature:52#9006#Ksharan reavers}, {@LinkCreature:52#9007#ragers}, {@LinkCreature:52#5004#shadowweavers}, {@LinkCreature:52#5001#swordmasters}, and {@LinkCreature:52#5002#archers} occupying the furnace.

Report to Raneria in Habere when the mission is complete.
Here's your reward, and the gratitude of the federation!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
